name: .GHOST (PersonaBlack)
description:
Am I gone?.. Are you?...

Created for A Game By Its Cover 2018, and based off the concept by Joe Wright, Ghost is a light survival horror that deals with the themes of loss and overcoming grief.

You must journey into the void of death and rediscover who you once were in order to move on, but not all memories are joyful, and if you lose yourself in the past you may find it impossible to find your way back...
